Line3.11E6C2: I have asked that we pass by the statue of revered Tibault, and though I can see he chafes at such a thing, he has granted my request.
Line5.11E6C2: He knows things I never thought to seek out, and he is generous. Some scholars jealously guard all things they know. Not him.
Line1.11E6C2: My companion seems harsh to many, but beneath his bluster and his sword lies a scholar, as hungry for knowledge as I am.
